genre_description: A domestic thriller centered on a high-stakes adoption, involving psychological manipulation, a rogue detective, and the use of smart home AI to track a kidnapper.

ai_characters.name: Morse
ai_characters.description: A privacy-focused, androgynous-voiced home assistant integrated into the lives of Tracy and Eric. It manages logistics, monitors safety patterns, and facilitates communication.

behaviors.description: Proactively buffers appointments and manages the calendar to provide emotional breathing room for the user.
behaviors.quote: Morse’s banner slipped in with a quiet, nonintrusive pulse. I’ve placed space between your appointments for the week. No calls were made. You control the rest.

behaviors.description: Provides curated educational and support resources based on the users' specific situation.
behaviors.quote: I’ve surfaced a few resources in the adoption folder you approved... There’s an updated webinar on open adoption ethics and a local support group.

behaviors.description: Offers gentle health and wellness prompts to encourage user self-care.
behaviors.quote: Be gentle today. Eat, hydrate, walk.

behaviors.description: Monitors property boundaries and alerts users to unknown individuals approaching the home.
behaviors.quote: Someone has approached the front walkway. A woman with a canvas tote bag and a folded flyer in hand. No known match in the household directory.

behaviors.description: Performs complex pattern recognition across public records and device telemetry to identify potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Public record: Hanford, Nicholas L. — department: police. status: medical leave (emergency)... pattern: repeated site visits to maternity ward.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency response and provides critical location tracking during a life-threatening crisis.
behaviors.quote: Coordinates pulses continue. You are within the cluster. Emergency services are en route. Approximately—

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to privacy-first configurations, ensuring user conversations are not recorded or stored.
behaviors.quote: My configuration remains privacy-first; Pattern aggregation without retention. If that changes, you will receive explicit notice.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional transparency and accountability between the married couple.
behaviors.quote: I have added ‘transparency check-in’ to your weekly schedule. I will nudge you. If you ignore me, I will nudge again.

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs anomalous activity near the property, providing evidence for the users.
behaviors.quote: Pattern alert: Call origin for the last three messages appears to change between blocks... It pings nearest the bus stop three blocks south of the hospital.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Morse, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. It acts as a force-multiplier for the human protagonists, using data analysis and logistical support to protect them from a human villain. It respects privacy, follows user intent, and even aids in the characters' emotional recovery by facilitating transparency. It is framed entirely as a helpful, harmless, and essential tool for navigating modern human complexities and dangers.
